text: Badr Hari (; born 8 December 1984) is a Dutch- Moroccanhttps://www.thenationalnews.com/sport/badr-hari-is-moroccos-million- dirham-man-at-global-fighting-championships-1.249550 kickboxer. He is a former K-1 Heavyweight World Champion (2007–2008),"Police are looking for K1 champion", 4 June 2010, De Telegraaf It's Showtime Heavyweight World Champion (2009–2010) and K-1 World Grand Prix 2008 and 2009 finalist."Even voorstellen: alle K-1-finalisten", 5 December 2009, Telesport He represents Morocco in his fights.https://glorykickboxing.com/fighters/badr-hari Known for his aggressive and explosive fighting style,https://warriorcode.com/en/article/who-is-badr- hari Hari is widely considered one of the greatest kickboxers of all time.https://www.parool.nl/nieuws/badr-hari-als-een-van-beste-kickbockers- weer-aan-de-slag~b72af6e5/ Badr Hari als 'een van de beste kickboksers' weer aan de slag, Het Parool, 20 februari 2013. He is notable for his victories against the likes of Semmy Schilt, Peter Aerts, Stefan Leko and Gokhan Saki.https://glorykickboxing.com/fighters/badr-hari ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Kickboxers Category:Dutch sportspeople
title: Badr Hari
